DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective case-control physiopathological study, which main objective is to determine the genetic host factors predisposing to candidemia. Secondary objectives are to develop new diagnosis tools using the biological collection, to describe and update epidemiology, to analyse the influence of genetic polymorphisms on prognosis.
DOC.criteria: Patient older than 18 years. Informed consent. Positive blood culture with isolation of Candida sp. No informed consent. Patient younger than 18. No insurance coverage.
